Description: Order pet to leave the battlefield.
Description_ja: ペットを帰還させる。
Name: Away

Description: Order pet to follow behind you.
Description_ja: ペットを自身に追従させる。
Name: Heel

Description: Order pet to move to a specified location.
Description_ja: ペットを指定地点まで移動させる。
Name: Place

Description: Order pet to remain where it is.
Description_ja: ペットをその場で待機させる。
Name: Stay

Description: Order pet to refrain from attacking until you attack or are attacked.
Description_ja: ペットに、自分が攻撃を行うか、自分が攻撃を受けるまで戦闘しないように命令する。
Name: Guard

Description: Order pet to refrain from attacking until ordered to do so.
Description_ja: ペットに、自分が指示を出すまで戦闘しないように命令する。
Name: Steady

Description: Order pet to attack.
Description_ja: ペットに攻撃させる。
Name: Sic

Description: Order pet to attack, but refrain from using certain actions until ordered to do so.
Description_ja: ペットに攻撃させる。ただし、一部のアクションは命令を受けるまで実行しない。
Name: Obey

Description: Deals wind damage with a potency of 90.

<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>「セミオーダー」<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>状態では命令を受けるまで実行しない。
Name: Flaming Crush
Name_ja: フレイミングクラッシュ

Description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 200 to all enemies in a cone before it.

<UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>Additional Effect:<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> Fire damage over time

<UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>Potency:<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> 20

<UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>Duration:<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> 15s

Executed when master uses <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enkindle<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Description_ja:
対象に向かって火属性前方扇範囲魔法攻撃。　<UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>威力：<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>200

<UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>追加効果：<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>対象に火属性の継続ダメージを付与する

<UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>威力：<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>20　<UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>効果時間：<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>15秒

マスターが<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>「エンキンドル」<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>を実行することで使用する。

Name: Embrace

Description:
Gradually restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.

When <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Obey<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is active, will only execute upon command.

Some effects cannot be removed.

Name: Fey Caress

Description:
Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay of self and nearby party members by 3%.

<UIForeground>F201F8</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F9</UIGlow>Duration:<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> 30s

When <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Obey<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is active, will only execute upon command.
